isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FAN BLADE/FAN DRIVE, REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Raise cab and engage ram safety prop.
Remove both charge air pipes.
Disconnect both radiator stabilizers (struts) from radiator frame.
Loosen lower radiator support bolts.

note.para: Steps 4 and 5 are performed to increase access for removal and installation.

step1.para: Remove fan blade from fan drive and temporarily set fan blade in shroud against radiator.
Remove fan drive and alternator belts.
Drain air from air tanks and close drain valves.
Disconnect electrical connections and air line from fan drive.
Remove fan drive assembly.
Remove shift control rod support bracket from cylinder head. Set rod aside for access.
Remove fan blade from shroud opening.
Temporarily set fan blade in shroud against radiator.
Install shift control rod support bracket to cylinder head.
Install fan drive assembly and torque mounting bolts.
Connect electrical connections and air line to fan drive.
Install fan drive and alternator belts. Adjust belts to specification.
Install fan blade to fan drive and torque nuts.
Connect both radiator stabilizers (struts) to radiator frame.
Tighten lower radiator support bolts.
Install both charge air pipes and torque clamps.
Disengage ram safety prop and secure prop to retainer/lower cab.
Remove wheel chocks.
